com.resourcemanager.model.Resource

  • Packages that use Resource 
    Package Description
    com.resourcemanager.controller

    • Uses of Resource in com.resourcemanager.controller

      Methods in com.resourcemanager.controller with parameters of type Resource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String AllocationController.allocate(Resource p, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Allows a resource to join a particular allocation and passes that to the application cache and persistence layer, updating the associated Project and Resource.
      java.lang.String ResourceController.saveResource(Resource resource, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Takes the user input submitted via the edit Resource view and merges changes to the data model for the Resource and associated Allocations and Skills before passing that to the persistence layer.

    • Uses of Resource in com.resourcemanager.dao

      Methods in com.resourcemanager.dao that return Resource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Resource ResourceDAO.getResourceByID(java.lang.Long id)
      Optionally retrieves a Resource from the data source by Id if it exists.
      Methods in com.resourcemanager.dao that return types with arguments of type Resource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Resource> ResourceDAO.listResources()
      Retrieves all Resources from the data source.
      java.util.List<Resource> ResourceDAO.searchResources(long skillId, java.time.LocalDate startDate, java.time.LocalDate endDate, int hours)
      Retrieves all Resources from the data source that match the search criteria of Skill, hours and no allocations during the specified time period from the persistence layer and passes them to the Resources view to display them to the user and respond to their input.
      Methods in com.resourcemanager.dao with parameters of type Resource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ResourceDAO.addResource(Resource resource)
      Persists a new Resource in the data source.
      void ResourceDAO.updateResource(Resource resource)
      Updates an existing Resource in the data source.
